name: Infectoid (Snipe76, AofJ)
description:
Turn based puzzle game where you control an alien that escapes from a secret lab.

The alien infects people by jumping from one to another, meanwhile killing the last infected.

Created using custom created 8-bit graphics with passion.

Made for Weekly Game Jam Week 185 - Parasite

Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement Direction

Spacebar - Skip turn

Esc button - Menu
